meanings.definition: A girl who behaves in a boyish manner
meanings.sent1: The group of tomboys played soccer with the boys.
meanings.sent2: Tomboys often prefer playing outside and getting dirty.
meanings.sent3: The tomboys challenged the boys to a race, and they won!
meanings.sent4: Her confidence and boldness made her stand out as a tomboy among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The tomboys' adventurous spirit led them to explore the forest together.

meanings.definition: Girls who enjoy rough, noisy activities traditionally associated with boys
meanings.sent1: During recess, the tomboys loved playing tag and climbing trees.
meanings.sent2: The group of tomboys cheered loudly at the exciting basketball game.
meanings.sent3: The tomboys' laughter echoed through the playground as they played tag.
meanings.sent4: Their love for adventure made the tomboys the bravest kids in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The tomboys' energy and enthusiasm were contagious during the game of capture the flag.

meanings.definition: A girl who dresses and acts like a boy
meanings.sent1: One of the tomboys wore a baseball cap and baggy jeans every day.
meanings.sent2: The tomboys confidently rocked short haircuts and sneakers.
meanings.sent3: The tomboys' fashion sense confused some people, but they didn't care.
meanings.sent4: Her tomboy style inspired other girls to embrace their unique fashion choices.
meanings.sent5: The tomboys' tomboyish outfits made them stand out in a sea of dresses and skirts.
